General.Name: Marathon Nextgen Realty Limited
General.Description: Marathon Nextgen Realty Limited engages in the construction, development, and sale of commercial and residential real estate projects in India. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Mumbai, India. Marathon Nextgen Realty Limited is a subsidiary of Marathon Realty Private Limited.

0.Name: Mr. Chetan Ramniklal Shah B.Tech, M.S. (USA)
